content: Those are some terrible stories. I've never met any women like that. Maybe it's b/c I'm selective with who I allign myself with. Now I have met many-a-woman who has stayed in the marriage b/c they couldn't get out of the marriage financially. These are the ones that(usuaally) eventually end up cheating b/c they are no longer ''in love'', but want to be in love with SOMEBODY, so they cheat. "It is the weak who are cruel. Gentleness can only be expected from the strong" -- Leo Roskin

title: WOMEN, for when men need to be taken down a peg.

content: The way I see it both are getting what they want. At least for awhile and sometime !
reply: The way I see it both are getting what they want. At least for awhile and sometime !
title: WOMEN, for when men need to be taken down a peg.

content: My wife said, "I didn't marry you for your looks... you ain't good lookin, no other woman would have you". "I married you for your money". I might have given her the wrong impression that I was well off, when I told her my father was in oil. I didn't say he manufactured baby oil. Ya can't get rich makin baby oil. Her father is a software engineer, his income is about $2 million per year. He own's several pieces of very expensive real estate. My wife thought, with my fathers money and her fathers that we would do quite well. We had signed prenupt agreements that we would share 50/50 in community property! I might be ugly, but I ain't dumb! Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!
